message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have 300k, but I'm taking the lion's share!
I'll give you 400k, but I'm taking the majority!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'll give you 300k, but I'm getting serious about taking the majority!
You're running out of time, I'm calling the shots now!
I'll give you 200k, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're getting close to losing everything, don't make me have to take it all!
I'll give you 100k, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're almost out of time, I'm taking control of this deal!
I'll give you 50k, but I'm not giving up yet!
Last chance, take it or leave it! I'm taking the majority of what's left!
